ABOUT.LiveSupport: For live support of Token Mold, join the Foundry VTT Discord and post any questions in #module-troubleshooting!
ABOUT.OriginallyCreatedBy: Based on the original code by
ABOUT.ProjectPage: View the Project Page to report issues or comment on this Project at:
ABOUT.SupportTheCreator: If you enjoy Token, please consider donating to the creator at:
ABOUT.Title: Token Mold
ABOUT.Wiki: View the Token Mold wiki at:

DIALOG.DeleteConfigConfirm: Are you sure you wish to delete the following configuration:

NAME.AddCustomPrefix: Add the following custom word to beginning of the name:
NAME.AddCustomSuffix: Add the following custom word after the name:
NAME.AddNumbers: Add counting numbers to name as Suffix.
NAME.BaseNamePrefix: Replace with first 2 letters of actor's name
NAME.BaseNameOverride: Hold Shift to override name removal or replacement and always add the base name
NAME.ChooseRolltable: Choose adjectives from following rollable Table:
NAME.IncreaseIndexHelp: The index increase will be chosen randomly from within this range. Minimum of 1. (Uniformly distributed)
NAME.NumberStyle: Choose number style. The first field may not be empty!
NAME.PrefixHelp: Configure options that happen before the token's name.
NAME.ReplaceHelp: For more information on how this works look onto the modules homepage.
NAME.ReplaceInfo1: The chosen option will replace the tokens base name with a generated name.
NAME.ReplaceInfo2: You can choose a number of attributes. For each attribute you can choose possible values and assign them a language. On token creation the first value that fits will be chosen. If no fitting value was found, the default will be used.
NAME.ReplaceInfo3: Important: Enabling this feature will result in about 100MB of extra memory used! (for GMs only)
NAME.ResetCounter: Reset counter for this scene for all tokens.
NAME.ResetCounterHelp: Resets the Counter for newly created tokens. This will reset to the highest placed index after a page reload. On maps with a high amount of tokens this could take a few seconds.

SETTINGS.ConfigHint: Configure Settings for Token Mold.  Also available at the top of the Actor Tab.
SETTINGS.PreloadTablesHint: Preloading tables used in the name/adjective generation can increase performance, however there is a balance between this and the number and size of tables being loaded - too many or too large and it could have a negative impact as they are kept in memory even when not being used.

SIDEBAR.Name: (De-)activate Name randomizing
SIDEBAR.Reapply: Reapplies all settings to selected tokens as if those were replaced onto the scene.

tmold.name.addNumbers: Add counting numbers to name as Suffix.
tmold.name.numberStyle: Choose number style. The first field may not be empty!
tmold.name.increaseIndexHelp: The index increase will be chosen randomly from within this range. Minimum of 1. (Uniformly distributed)
tmold.name.resetCounter: Reset counter for this scene for all tokens.
tmold.name.resetCounterHelp: Resets the Counter for newly created tokens. This will reset to the highest placed index after a page reload. On maps with a high amount of tokens this could take a few seconds.
tmold.name.chooseRolltable: Choose adjectives from following rollable Table:
tmold.name.baseNamePrefix: Avrae Naming Scheme: Replace with first 2 letters of actor's name or first letter of each word.
tmold.name.baseNameOverride: Hold Shift to override name removal or replacement and always add the base name
tmold.name.replaceHelp: For more information on how this works look onto the modules homepage.
tmold.name.replaceInfo1: The chosen option will replace the tokens base name with a generated name.
tmold.name.replaceInfo2: You can choose a number of attributes. For each attribute you can choose possible values and assign them a language. On token creation the first value that fits will be chosen. If no fitting value was found, the default will be used.
tmold.name.replaceInfo3: Important: Enabling this feature will result in about 100MB of extra memory used! (for GMs only)
tmold.stat.name: Name
tmold.system.sendToChat: Send result to Chat (This setting just changes if the rolls are send to chat. Whether HP are rolled or not is based on the settings done in the sidebar.)
tmold.system.setTokenSize: Set Token size to creature size and scaled to map scale
tmold.system.setTokenSizeHelp: Sets token size according to the size set in the actor sheet adhering to the rules. If the map has has ft. as distance unit it will scale accordingly.
tmold.warn.removeName: Can not configure Token Mold to completely remove name.
